DOC.brief_summary: To investigate pharmacokinetic effect vaginally administer antimycotic ( miconazole ) , antibiotic ( clindamycin ) , spermicide ( nonoxynol-9 ) concomitant use tampon use intravaginal ring release anastrozole levonorgestrel
DOC.brief_title: Effect Concomitant Use Antimycotic , Antibiotic , Spermicide Tampons Pharmacokinetics Anastrozole Levonorgestrel Released From Intra-vaginal Ring
DOC.criteria: Healthy premenopausal female subject . Age : 18 50 year ( inclusive ) first screen visit . For subject > 45 year follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) investigate second screening visit confirm premenopausal status ( FSH < 40 IU/L serum ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) equal 18 , equal 30 kg / mÂ² first screen visit . Adequate venous access . Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction Agreement use adequate nonhormonal contraception . Confirmation subject 's health insurance coverage prior first screen examination/visit . Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal . Thrombophlebitis , venous / arterial thromboembolic disease ( particularly deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism , stroke , myocardial infarction ) . Presence history prodromata thrombosis ( e.g . transient ischemic attack , angina pectoris ) . Known hypersensitivity study medication ( active substance excipients preparation ) . Regular intake medication hormonal contraceptive . Use systemic topical medication substance oppose study objective might influence within 4 week first administration study medication , Smoking 10 cigarette daily ; subject smoker : subject old 35 year Suspicion know current drug , medicine alcohol abuse ( include anabolics , highdose vitamin ) . Abnormal cervical smear Previous ectopic pregnancy .
